notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: S.L.C. supervised the investigation, carried out data analysis and wrote the manuscript. M.E.R.-P. collected blood samples in the Serengeti National Park; O.N. isolated the Serengeti viruses from samples; J.K., H.A. and S.O. prepared virus pools, isolated viral RNA, carried out RT-PCR and sequencing; J.M.K. and J.A.P.E. carried out data analysis. J.A.P.E. carried out data analysis and constructed phylogenic trees.
